articles.title: New Dungeons & Dragons album, Spelljams, absolutely rips

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Netflix’s Addams Family TV spinoff Wednesday gets its first trailer
articles.description: Wednesday Addams leads a new Addams Family spinoff series coming to Netflix from director Tim Burton. The first trailer shows Jenna Ortega stars as Wednesday, Catherine Zeta-Jones as Morticia, and Luis Guzmán as Gomez.
articles.content: Netflix series looks like bloody fun
